Uses of Class
utilities.Vector2D

Packages that use Vector2D 
Package Description
gameParts
These are all the components for heccin games (as far as hecc-up is concerned).
oh_hecc.game_parts.passage
Classes that represent the individual passages in a Heccin Game (and also allow them to be edited)
oh_hecc.mvc
Some model-view-controller bits for OH-HECC.
oh_hecc.mvc.controller
this originally held some classes used for some controller bits.
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits
This package contains various objects used within the model that users can see/manipulate/interact with/etc.
utilities
Some general utility classes that I figured would be better off over here in their own package instead of in the thick of it.
